Row.Text: Receive the strongest Naval Unit every time you succeed in an [icon:ESPIONAGE] Espionage Action, if you can place a Naval Unit. +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and +1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence per Age for every Naval Unit stationed on a [icon:CITY_URBAN] District. No [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence penalty for your [icon:ESPIONAGE] Espionage being revealed. Opponents cannot use Counter Spy against you.

[BLIST][LI]Receive the strongest [B]Naval Unit [/B]every time you succeed in an [B][icon:ESPIONAGE] Espionage Action[/B], if you can place a Naval Unit.[LI][B]+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture[/B] and [B]+1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence[/B] per Age for every [B]Naval Unit[/B] stationed on a [icon:CITY_URBAN] [B]District [/B]. [LI]No [B][icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence[/B] penalty for your [B][icon:ESPIONAGE] Espionage[/B] being revealed. [LI]Opponents cannot use [B]Counter Spy[/B] against you.[/LIST]
Likes the Civilization with the smallest number of Naval Units. Dislikes the one with the greatest number of Naval Units.
